scripts.dev: concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER -c magenta,cyan "npm run --workspace client dev" "npm run --workspace server dev"
scripts.vercel-build: npm run --workspace client build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const src='client/dist';const out='dist';if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.rmSync(out,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,out,{recursive:true});}else if(!fs.existsSync(out)){throw new Error('No dist directory found after build');}"
